article_title: Obama's Wrong; The Economy Is Improving Because Of Congressional Deadlock

article_metadata.author: Merrill Matthews

og.description: President Obama claims that congressional deadlock if hurting economic growth; a better case can be made that the deadlock is spurring economic growth.
